mapper.select: select t1.parentItemCode itemCode,t1.parentItemName itemName,sum(ifnull(t2.cnt,0)) count from ( select t.hospital hospital, sum(inp)/10000 cnt from ods.ods_HOSPITAL_INCOME t force index(HOSPITAL_INCOME_sumindex) where t.hospital in and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date< #{endDate} group by t.hospital ) t2 left join ( select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName, parent.id as parentItemCode, parent.item_name as parentItemName, hcb.seq_no as seqNo from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb, hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo parent where hcb.parent_item_code = parent.id and hcb.id in and length(hcb.item_code)=10 ) t1 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital group by t1.parentItemName order by t1.seqNo

select t1.comm_config_unitgrade_id itemCode, case t1.comm_config_unitgrade_id when 1 then "一级医院" when 2 then "二级医院" when 3 then "三级医院" when 4 then "社区医院" else "" end itemName, round(sum(ifnull(t2.cnt,0))/sum( case when t2.cnt>0 then 1 else 0 end),2) count from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo t1 left join (select t.hospital hospital, sum(inp)/10000 cnt from ods.ods_HOSPITAL_INCOME t force index(HOSPITAL_INCOME_sumindex) where t.hospital in and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date< #{endDate} group by t.hospital ) t2 on t1.item_code = t2.hospital where t1.id in and t1.comm_config_unitgrade_id is not null and t1.comm_config_unitgrade_id!="" and length(t1.item_code)=10 and t2.cnt>0 group by t1.comm_config_unitgrade_id;

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName, round(IFNULL(t2.cnt,0),2) count from ( select t.hospital hospital, sum(inp)/10000 cnt from ods.ods_HOSPITAL_INCOME t force index(HOSPITAL_INCOME_sumindex) where t.hospital in (select id from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo where parent_item_code = #{parentId} and id in and length(item_code)=10) and t.visit_date >= #{startDate} and t.visit_date< #{endDate} group by t.hospital ) t2 left join ( select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName, hcb.seq_no as seqNo from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb where hcb.parent_item_code = #{parentId} and hcb.id in and length(hcb.item_code)=10 ) t1 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital order by t1.seqNo

select hsp.id,hsp.item_Name itemName, (select round(IFNULL(sum(inp),0)/10000,2) thisYear from ods.ods_HOSPITAL_INCOME t force index(HOSPITAL_INCOME_sumindex) where t.visit_date>= #{startDate} and t.visit_date < #{endDate} and hospital=hsp.id) countNew, (select round(IFNULL(sum(inp),0)/10000,2) from ods.ods_HOSPITAL_INCOME t force index(HOSPITAL_INCOME_sumindex) where t.visit_date>= concat(date_format(#{startDate},'%Y')- 1,date_format(#{startDate},'-%m-%d')) and t.visit_date < concat(date_format(#{endDate},'%Y') - 1 ,date_format(#{endDate},'-%m-%d'),' 23:59:59.0') and hospital=hsp.id) countOld from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hsp where hsp.id in

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName,t2.dateData dateData, t2.cnt count from ( select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb where hcb.id in ) t1 left join ( select t.hospital hospital, date_format(t.VISIT_DATE,#{dateFormater}) dateData, round(IFNULL(sum(inp),0)/10000,2) cnt from ods.ods_HOSPITAL_INCOME t force index(HOSPITAL_INCOME_sumindex) where t.hospital in AND visit_date >= #{startDate} AND visit_date < #{endDate} group by t.hospital,dateData ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital order by t1.itemCode
